Html: When I maximize my app that includes a RibbonWindow, it covers my Windows Status Bar at the bottom.  How do you prevent this?  Thanks.

Hi, this is a known issue with RibbonWindow and will be fixed in Ribbon V1 (see the related Issue Tracker post here: http://www.codeplex.com/wpf/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=8506).  I don't believe there are any workarounds at this time.
